Message.Msg: Good lord. You wrote something brief, without idiotic, meaningless quotation marks and parentheses; no schoolgirl giggles, and it's factually correct. All the words are spelled right and the post does not insult anyone. You did it! Good for you, jon. I am outa here!

Message.Title: Next Obama Move
Message.Msg: It's either going to be passing a statute that says "No more Stock buybacks" by these conglomerates, or "no dividend increases", until your hiring is increased substantially. Most of these companies are over staffed as it is, but the Dems think they need more deadweight walking the floors. Cut employees now, everybody. Walmart, Target, and the malls are over run with bodies. Computer hardware makers don't need half the staff they have. T probably has 25% too many folks running around too.
As I understand it, they "agreed" because the bankruptcy judge forced them to mediation.
And to think, you work at Mickey D's and no one will listen to you about how to manage Walmart, Target and T. Silly people.

And the fast food chains have to go away, or at least the guy who says, "Do you want fries with that?". Can you believe that they actually considered a Mc Donald's position a "job" in the labor reports?
Actually, I believe it's "mate".

Message.Title: Charts between T vs VZ Diverging since 2008
Message.Msg: I've been comparing the charts of these 2 companies. In 2006 VZ was about $4 a share higher than T, then at the peak in 2008 VZ was $4 a share higher, and finally in the dip of 2009 VZ was about $4 a share higher than T. But in the past 2 years VZ has been pulling away even faster. At the peak of 2012 T hit a high of $38.50 while VZ peaked at $48.75, that a $10 difference. And in todays price they are seperated by $9 per share. This is just my observation, but I hoping that we are going to start seeing a convergence and T is going to pull their head out before CHL takes them both to the cleaners.

There ya go again, skipping right over the point of the post. Who cares if you don't eat them? The point is that rather than continue to negotiate and work, collecting paychecks, etc. the union thugs elected to wall and shut the place down. The union made a good decision for their members, you all don't need any stinking paychecks, we just shut the company down, you don't need to worry the government will keep you in UE checks for a year and by then Lord Barry will have solved all the problems and we will be drinking the free Bubble Up and eating that Rainbow stew. Yeah, right!

Topic.Title: Breaking news BO admin denies requests to defend Benghazi compoud during attack

Message.Msg: Now they are claiming that the intelligence folks wrote the altered presentation for Ms. Rice, but the WH keeps saying she was just reading what she was given when she was sent out there by the WH. State says they didn't do it, and she works for State. The intelligence guys say that is not what their reports said, and she doesn’t work for them. All the confusion is intentional to give Obama deniability, allow the media to ignore it so it will go away...they hope and if it doesn't, they will lay blame on the Republicans for attack a black woman. It's all a charade to protect Billary and in the same breath the President from having to admit some poor decision making and misjudgments that they could lie their way out of this just prior to the elections. Liberal politics at its best…and worst.

Topic.Title: Breaking news BO admin denies requests to defend Benghazi compoud during attack

Message.Msg: Who cares? You're upset about what? That the president waited a few days before revealing information on a national security issue? "to give Obama deniability" Oh give me a break. You have no clue why they changed "al-Quaeda" to "extremists" in those talking points--which is really what we are fighting over. Were they protecting an informant? Were they not letting the perpetrators know they were on to them? Were they trying to handle a delicate diplomatic situation? Were they just being careful? What Republicans seem to forget is that Al-Quada perpetrated these attacks. Not Susan Rice. Not the President. And not Saddam Hussein. You want to talk about intelligence being politicized? Talk about 2003 and the blood spilled for those lies. What we do know is that under Obama terrorists are dealt with, no matter how much you nattering hacks try to politicize national security.

Don't confuse yourself with white Southern Christians, Lavendar. I am a white Southern Christian. What I and your fellow Captain D patrons (as you'd find out if you weren't too craven to talk to them) heap scorn upon is racists like you. America hates YOU, Lavendar, because you are a racist. There is nothing else about you, no other group you can pretend to latch on to, that is the object of our hate for you. It is just YOU, and it is because you are a racist. So don't try to hide behind white people, or Southerners, or Christians. They have nothing to do with you. You are a racist, and America hates racists. Don't try to diffuse the contempt people have for you. It is just for you.

Topic.Title: ObamaCare causes Medical giant Stryker to cut 1,170 jobs

Message.Msg: Wow, if these guys only realized, that by voting that Barry hold onto his job, they were ending theirs. I know one thing, people in Telco are having to pay for 10 to 25% of their previously free surgeries. Many workers are getting things done now, before their plans change for the worse. I can't think of anyone who is doing better under this regime, except maybe illegal aliens. I'm still shocked that only 16% of Seniors voted. I guess those Philadelphia black panthers were successful in frightening the older Conservative voters. People who are ill-informed are forcing pain to us all, via the ballot box.

I can't fathom that the vast majority of Jews voted to re-elect Obama (Imagine if just one of those missles fired into Israel had biological, chemical, or nuclear payloads), would they ask for a recount? Barry is on a victory lap vacation to get congrats from his Asian backers. Some retired Admiral from the 7th fleet, said he hoped Obama while in Asia, would send a message to the Chinese that we are willing to back our friends, if threatened. I had to laugh, Barry is exactly what Clint said he was, an empty chair, suit, not ready for prime time. A Weak, Weak, leader. And as time goes on, with every tick of the clock, this Great Country is in peril.

The deck is now stacked against those who can really make a difference in society. Some Conservatives should start a foundation for those kids in Maryland, who now have to compete with illegal aliens to get an education. Only 10% of our citizens who apply, actually get in. Barry has started a website that spells out what freebies that he is making available to them. The Taxpayer abuse here in the Peoples Republic of Maryland, will set records in the coming years under this regime.
